_header: While men and women wonen together
Note: Attributed to Jerome in the MS.
_description: The seeds of lust — one proverbial couplet translating ‘Si cum viris femine habita[n]t incendiarium diaboli non deerit’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Quil men & wemmen woniȝen togidereÞe fendes brond sone
                    comet þidere
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 21.
